channel.title: 2 Errors. I need help please!
channel.description:
I get two errors. One when compiling, one when running. Please help. This is the one from compile.
[code]Found: Java JDK 1.6.0_04 Compiling Server, Please Wait... client.java:15931: cannot find symbol symbol : variable PutNPCCords location: class client PutNPCCords = true; ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
This comes up in run.
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: " 500" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:122) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:30) at server.main(server.java:50)
[/code]
Anyone know this?

item.title: 2 Errors. I need help please!
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

in shops.cfg you used a space instead of a tab (2nd error)

Read full topic

item.title: 2 Errors. I need help please!
item.dc:creator: @zammyking111 zammyking111
item.description:
@zammyking111 wrote:

For the first one it is saying that PutNPCCords = true; isn’t defined in the client either u have it spelled with too many caps or you spelled something wrong.

winks it should be

PutNPCCoords = true; winks

Read full topic

item.title: 2 Errors. I need help please!
item.dc:creator: @DDT DDT
item.description:
@DDT wrote:

I get two errors. One when compiling, one when running. Please help. This is the one from compile.

Found: Java JDK 1.6.0_04 Compiling Server, Please Wait... client.java:15931: cannot find symbol symbol : variable PutNPCCords location: class client PutNPCCords = true; ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

This comes up in run.

[code]Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "
500"
at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:122)
at ShopHandler.(ShopHandler.java:30)
at server.main(server.java:50)

[/code]

Anyone know this?
